thread.title: Ridiculously cute grizzly bear rolls down hill at Denali National Park
thread.title_full: Ridiculously cute grizzly bear rolls down hill at Denali National Park

title: Ridiculously cute grizzly bear rolls down hill at Denali National Park
text:
Ridiculously cute grizzly bear rolls down hill at Denali National Park Last updated 10:42, August 27 2015 
This ridiculously cute grizzly bear will instantly make your day a better one. 
A tourist at Denali National Park recently captured a video of the playful bear appearing to have some fun in its surroundings. 
David Pangborn uploaded the video to Youtube and it's since been watched close to 2 million times. Tourists can be heard laughing and taking photos as the bear tumbles down the hill. "You guys are seeing something that I've never seen before," a tour guide said. DAVID PANGBORN/YOUTUBE 
A playful grizzly bear has been filmed rolling down a hill in Denali National Park, much to the tourists' delight. 
"This was the first bear that we had come across. The bus driver stopped and parked the bus and we proceeded to watch the bear do this for 20 or so minutes," Pangborn told Alaska Dispatch News. 
Alaska's vast Denali National Park is great for spotting wildlife such as bear, moose, caribou, wolves, mountain sheep and soaring eagles in their natural wilderness habitat. 
it's home to over 300 grizzly bears, but the chances of seeing one roll down a hill are slim.
